•    Recheck the dose of drugs 
•    Exclude all other causes of symptoms 
•    Estimate the severity of the adverse effects 
•    Document the adverse effects 
•    The offending drugs may need to be stopped (if the severity is more) and to be reintroduced gradually when the symptoms disappear
